artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Artist: after Mitan; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers unbound with three hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress (P.15,232, P.15,233, P.15,234)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Trente-troisième Cahier, 10 Octobre 1787
